column1: Use the guidance to help you fill in the multiple Annex VII template. Each row you fill in is a single Annex VII record. You need to fill in all compulsory information and any other Annex VII details that apply to your green list waste exports. Make sure you save the template in a CSV format.
column2: Enter all relevant waste codes and description of waste (compulsory)
column10: Enter an estimated or actual quantity of waste in either tonnes or cubic metres (do not fill this in if sending unlisted waste that is going to a laboratory)
column12: Enter waste in kilograms either as an estimate or actual amount (only if sending unlisted waste that is going to a laboratory)
column13: Enter either 'estimate' or 'actual' (for both bulk waste and unlisted waste)
column14: Enter all exporter (person who organises the shipment) details (compulsory)
column33: Enter all first carrier (waste generator) details (only if known)
column42: Enter all second carrier details (only if second carrier is known)
column51: Enter all third carriers details (only if third carrier is known)
column60: Enter all fourth carrier details (only if fourth carrier is known)
column69: Enter alll fifth carrier details (only if fifth carrier is known)
column88: Enter location where waste will leave UK (only if known)
column89: Enter all transit countries (only if known)
column90: Enter all interim site details (only if required)
column98: Enter all laboratory details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column106: Enter all first recovery facility details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column114: Enter all second recovery facility details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column122: Enter all third recovery facility details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column129: Enter third recovery site recovery code
column130: Enter all fourth recovery facility details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column137: Enter fourth recovery site recovery code
column138: Enter all fifth recovery facility details (unlisted waste, only if required)
column145: Enter fifth recovery site recovery code

column1: Enter your own reference using only letters and numbers (maximum 20 characters, compulsory)
column6: Unlisted waste going to laboratory (enter 'yes' if applicable)
column7: All relevant EWC codes (enter at least one, but you can enter up to 5 if you need to, separated by commas)
column18: Exporter country (include the country-must be either 'England', 'Wales', 'Scotland', or 'Northern Ireland')
column25: Importer address (include the postcode if known)
column32: Estimated or actual waste collection date?
column34: First carrier address (include the postcode if known)
column40: First carrier means of transport (enter 'road', 'rail', 'sea', 'air' or 'inland waterways')
column41: First carrier means of transport details (e.g. trailer or registration numbers, max 200 characters)
column43: Second carrier address (include the postcode if known)
column49: Second carrier means of transport (enter 'road', 'rail', 'sea', 'air' or 'inland waterways')
column50: Second carrier means of transport details (e.g. trailer or registration numbers, max 200 characters)
column52: Third carrier address (include the postcode if known)
column58: Third carrier means of transport (enter 'road', 'rail', 'sea', 'air' or 'inland waterways')
column59: Third carrier means of transport details (e.g. trailer or registration numbers, max 200 characters)
column61: Fourth carrier address (include the postcode if known)
column67: Fourth carrier means of transport (enter 'road', 'rail', 'sea', 'air' or 'inland waterways')
column68: Fourth carrier means of transport details (e.g. trailer or registration numbers, max 200 characters, optional)
column70: Fifth carrier address (include the postcode if you have them)
column76: Fifth carrier means of transport (enter 'road', 'rail', 'sea', 'air' or 'inland waterways')
column77: Fifth carrier means of transport details (e.g. trailer or registration numbers, max 200 characters, optional)
column82: Waste collection country (must be either 'England', 'Wales', 'Scotland', or 'Northern Ireland')
column88: Nearest town, port or terminal where waste leaves UK (enter up to five if needed, in journey order)
column89: Transit countries (enter up to five countries if needed, in journey order from leaving UK)
column91: Interim site address (include postcode if known)
column107: First recovery facility address (include postcode if known)
column109: First recovery facility contact full name
column115: Second recovery facility address (include postcode if known)
column117: Second recovery facility contact full name

column125: Third recovery facility contact full name

column139: Fifth recovery facility address (include postcode if known)
column141: Fifth recovery facility contact full name
